replies.body: Personal opinion, but I think bruisers offer a really tricky spot. Tanks don't do damage, and damage duelers are squisy. Bruisers offer the best of both worlds (how very Hannah Montana of them). As one would imagine than they would be the recipient of a lot of balances changes if we are truly making the game as even of a playing field for all classes as possible. However idk, I'm one of those players that prefers breaking something to get something new, and than fixing it later.

> [{quoted}](name=Bazerka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=l1zbW2Ee,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2018-06-12T16:56:11.461+0000)

> Orrn, cho, and mundo full tank build? You're saying they do more damage than say a darius, garen, or illaoi going bruiser build? I hear you if they build bruiser, but than that supports my initial point X) (Cho ulti besides the point, thats just annoying IMO lol)

Idk I feel like I get spanked around in lane by them if they build full tank as most bruisers. Maybe I'm just trash though.

They can certainly build full tank and still do some damage. Think about it this way, if you're Camille and spend 60 - 90 seconds hitting a tank trying to kill them (cause lets be real its gonna take you that long). It will take the tank (it varies of course) prob 50 seconds to kill you by simply standing next to you with sunfire cape due to the relative health blocks. Its not the amt of damage a champ does that makes them hurt, its the amount of time it takes them to output that damage (if you're into cars its like torque vs horsepower). Bruisers are tricky cause they take forever to kill and still do a lot of damage in a short amount of time.

Eh, depending on where {{champion:164}}  is item wise this isn't quite right, the true damage on 2nd Q helps her deal w/ tanks a bit quicker than that (especially since maokai, who has the best sustain of the tanks is out of meta).  

If she has triforce its not gonna take her that long to chunk down a tank.

Sure all of this is a relative conversation lol. But in general a squishy fighter in an even lane is still gonna take a crap load of time pinging down a tank. I say this as having played a 6-0 wukong game and still taking a good 80 seconds to kill a poppy lol.

But then you have the ability as a tank to build IGB+sunfire+abyssal+thornmail, and be overall healthy as a damage soak but suddenly unhealthy as a damage dealer. Just like the issue pointed out about bruisers in general being a fine line for their ratio of damage:tanking ability. 

The only thing holding back tank builds like that is the amount of pen in the game now with conqueror/last whisper being recent changes/additions.

I personally think that these tank items that lean more onto the damage side of things like i listed above should be made more into health/damage items while the more pure ones like visage/randuins/adaptive be better empowered in their stats or passives.
Well in lane no one is full build, so they might have the better advantage. Late game, usually their damage gets outscaled.

Last I checked Cho was considered a Specialist, not a Tank, and Mundo is most definitely NOT a Tank either.

And Ornn has some relatively high damage in lane, but no burst, and no damage past 2 items (so roughly past 20 minutes).

So, yeah, Tanks don't do damage.
